snippet: Another baby, another request for friends and family to give a gift. Mothers uncomfortable with that are being given smaller, more casual parties where the gifts are also more modest.
abstract: Sprinkles, or small baby showers held to celebrate second, third or fourth pregnancies, are on the rise; parties have generated controversy, as some guests feel resentful about buying more gifts and, on the other side, some moms-to-be are uncomfortable with expectation that they do so.
lead_paragraph: Another baby, another request for friends and family to give a gift. Mothers uncomfortable with that are being given smaller, more casual parties where the gifts are also more modest.

headline.seo: Celebrating a New Baby, but Modestly
headline.main: For Baby No. 2 or 3, No Shower but a Sprinkle
headline.print_headline: For Baby No. 2 or 3, No Shower but a Sprinkle
